name: 3D FireTruck Racing PRO - Full Emergency Vehicles Racing Version
name_original: 3D FireTruck Racing PRO - Full Emergency Vehicles Racing Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for the wildest racing game you've ever played! In this adrenaline thrill rush, you get to drive a firetruck! With super easy controls, and lots of non-stop action, you won't be able to put this game down!

FEATURES

- Gorgeous 3D rendered graphics!
- Lots of non-stop action!
- Rocking soundtrack!
